author: newsr.in
title: Khan's chalet at 'Bigg Boss 9' gets a superhero twist!
text: ' Bigg Boss Nau – Double Trouble' is all set to open doors to an all-new set of contestants who will call the 'Bigg Boss' house their home for more than 100 days. And when the contestants have a brand-new home to look forward to, host for the season – Salman Khan – also gets a swanky freshly designed chalet which ups the ... »
